0.text:
See, pushing the switch generated additional text!

Beyond just providing a text-based adventure, Jellybean offers a full featured turn-based RPG system, complete with [BATTLES], [INVENTORY], and a convenient [JOURNAL] to keep track of you progress. Click [JOURNAL] on the [MENU BAR] to check it out!

1.text: An interact relies on the [EVENT] system to modify scenes: [EVENTS] change already existing and create new elements and dialogue to provide new avenues of play.

2.text: During the course of your adventure you will come across many useful [ITEMS] and [EQUIPMENT]. To pick up an item simply click it's name and then click [PICK UP] on the [ACTION BAR]

demoInteract.journal: Today I began my adventure using Jellybean Game Engine! I [INTERACTED] with a switch that generated extra text!

0.text: The [ITEM] has been added to your [INVENTORY]! Just click [INVENTORY] on the [MENU BAR] to see! Picking up an [ITEM] will also trigger an [EVENT]. Even picking up a simple [ITEM] can have far reaching consequences!

1.text: The [ITEM] you just picked up is a [CONSUMABLE] item that can be used once. Jellybean Engine also includes other classes of [ITEMS] like [ARMOUR] and [WEAPONS]. Why not [PICK UP] this Demo Weapon?

demoItem_0.journal: Today I found a strange [ITEM]. Hopefully I find a use for it some day!

0.text: Great! Now that you have a [WEAPON], you'll be needing some [ARMOUR]! Go ahead and [PICK UP] this Demo Armour.
Now that you have a [WEAPON] and [ARMOUR] go ahead and equip them by either clicking [EQUIP] to open the [EQUIP] menu or you may equip from the [INVENTORY].

1.text: Additionally, you will discover a number of [ITEMS] which can be used to interact with elements in the [SCENE]. These [ITEMS] are known as [KEYS] and are used as an alternative method of triggering [EVENTS] to modify scenes and dialogue. Here is the Primary Key take it, it may be useful in the future.

demoArmour.journal: I found my first key! I wonder what it does.

0.text: Jellybean also comes equipped with a full fledged dialogue system!

1.text: [CHARACTERS] contain unique dialogue trees which are modifiable by [EVENTS]. Why not check it out and say 'Hello!' to JB! To talk to a [CHARACTER] click on their name and then click [TALK] on the [ACTION BAR].

nextDialogue.journal: I got a chance to speak with Jellybean in my first ever [DIALOGUE]

0.text: [CHARACTER] [DIALOGUE] can modify [SCENES] as it has here. A fearsome [ENEMY] stands before you. Engage the [ENEMY] in [BATTLE] by clicking their name and then clicking [FIGHT] on the [ACTION BAR].

1.text: JB is cowering in fear of the [ENEMY]. Please, do something about this!

fifthDialogue.journal: JB showed me how dialogue can be used to modify scenes, scary!

0.text: The pitiful [ENEMY] lies in a broken lump on the ground.

1.text: Behind you, JB stands smiling serenely, grateful for your victory over the [ENEMY]

0.text: You did it! You defeated the [ENEMY]! Great job! How can I help you?

1.text: <button id='lastDialogue' class='dialogueButton'>Please, hold your applause, it was nothing.</button>

demoEnemy_0.journal: I defeated the despicable Demo Enemy and saved JB's life!

0.text: <button id='dialogueDescription' class='dialogueButton'>Tell me more about [ITEMS], [ENEMIES] and [INFO].</button>
